short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get inspired with a new quote every day!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Elevate your day with a spark of inspiration! "Motivational Quotes" is a Chrome extension designed to infuse your daily internet journey with energizing wisdom and positive vibes. A fresh quote, a carefully curated, motivational saying appears to help you focus, re-energize, and maintain a positive mindset throughout your day.
